fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- On a full moon night, you may publicly complain to the manager, causing a disturbance and roleblocking 3 random non-were players. This is public. (You may only complain to the manager 3 times.)
- On a new moon night, you may yell at some minorities on facebook, making them want to target you. Choose one player, they will be forced to target you tonight. They will not be notified of this.
- **Hunting Moon Enhancement: Talking to Corporate**
Your loud complaints have reached corporate, forcing them to take action and shut down the entire town, roleblocking every non-were player. (1 time use.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are detection immune but only on non-full moon nights.
- Whenever you are attacked on a full moon, the Were Killing automatically changes their target to your attacker.
